name: Cubion
description: Symbiosis of styles "shoot'em up" and "flappy bird". Completely randomly generated obstacles and enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
